name: @js-api-samples/map-drawing-terradraw
description: Basic sample for Terra Draw with Google Maps API.

scripts.build: tsc && bash ../jsfiddle.sh map-drawing-terradraw && bash ../app.sh map-drawing-terradraw && bash ../docs.sh map-drawing-terradraw && npm run build:vite --workspace=. && bash ../dist.sh map-drawing-terradraw
